name: Pon'sLotteryNumberGenerator
0:
”Alexa ask Pon lotto to quick pick Megamillions”
”Alexa ask Pon lotto to quick pick Powerball”
”Alexa ask Pon lotto to quick pick Lotto Texas”
skdetail:
Rated: Mature. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: pon lotto
des: You can use this Skill to quick pick numbers for the Powerball, Megamillions and Lotto Texas lotteries. Currently, the numbers are generated only for the Powerball, Megamillions and Lotto Texas . More lottos will be added in the future. First say "Open Pon lotto" or "Ask Pon Lotto" and then say "Quick Pick Megamillions" or "Quick pick Powerball" or "Quick pick Lotto Texas".
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
